name: SKALE
description: SKALE is the world's fastest blockchain, designed for secure Ethereum scaling. SKALE Appchains provide ZERO gas fees to end-users and have advanced features such as AI/ML smart contracts, on-chain file storage, interchain messaging, and zero-cost minting. SKALE enables developers to deploy their own configurable EVM blockchain in minutes without sacrificing speed, security, or decentralization.
